basic.description: This course covers geotechnical investigation, analysis, and design of different geotechnical structures, including earth retaining structures, slopes and embankments, earthwork with geosynthetics, as well as shallow foundations.
basic.subject: CEG
basic.title: Geotechnical Design

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: CEG 3011. Pre- or Corequisite: CGN 3508L.
